Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47

Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47.Network.Message

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AskWorkersPosition
    This message contains an array of coordinates (row1, column1, row2, column2) that indicates the initial positions of the worker of a specific player.
    ChooseAction
    This message contains the action and the direction which have been chosen by the player during the turn.
    ChooseWorkerByPosition
    This message contains the coordinates who contains the worker that the player chose to use during a specific turn.
    ConnectionAccepted
    This message contains the username and the color chosen by a player.
    ConnectionFailed
    This message contains an error of connection.
    ErrorMessage
    This
    FirstConnection
    This method contains the username and the color chosen by the player who connected first.
    GodChosen
    This message contains the god chosen by a player.
    ImportantMessage
    This message contains a generic information about the state of the game.
    ListOfGods
    This message contains the list of gods available during the game.
    Message
    This class represents a message which can be sent from the server to the client or the other way around.
    NewPosition  
    Ping
    This message contains a ping.
    PlayersNumber
    This message contains the numberOfPlayers of the game.
    PublicInformation
    This message contains all the informations about the players of the game: their usernames, their colors and the gods they had chosen.
    RequestPlayersNumber
    This message contains the number of players of the game.
    UpdatedSlot
    This message contains an update from the model (a modified slot).
    VisitableMessage
    This abstract class contains the method getContent which must be present in each Message that contains a Visitable attribute.
    WrongParameters
    This message contains the request of new parameters as they have already been used by someone else.
    YouAreTheChallenger
    This message is sent only to the player who has been chosen to be the Challenger to inform him.
